author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Street Arts Festival to promote Malaysian Tourism Center as Kuala Lumpur tourism iconTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Street Arts Festival to promote Malaysian Tourism Center as Kuala Lumpur tourism icon Published on : Saturday, October 24, 2015
The Malaysian Tourism Center (MaTiC) has, for the first time, planned for Street Arts Festival to be held in Kuala Lumpur on Nov 7 and 8. The Busker and Indie band competitions will be among activities lined-up for the MaTiC Street Arts Festival.
The Festival will also feature performances by artistes and demonstration on comic and cartoon drawing, mural and graffiti painting, street football competition.
Among the local artistes to perform during the festival are Akim and Majistret, Bunkface, Lan Typewriter, S.O.G, Ana Rafali, Shiha, Ainan Tasneem and Sakura Band.
There will also be a ‘Flash Hollywood and Football’ exhibition at the MaTiC Mini Auditorium and Gallery from Nov 6 to 8.
The festival could help promote the diversity and uniqueness of Malaysia to tourists, said Deputy Tourism and Culture Minister Mas Ermieyati Samsudin during a media conference on the festival in Kuala Lumpur.
It could also serve as a platform for those in the art industry to promote their talent and works. She added.
